column5: Hi guys Does anyone have a contact for the small numbered 'boat flags' that are used in tournaments that go in the lighting holes on your boat?  thanks Rich

Rich, I used to make my own using a piece of dowel.  Sticking the tourn. numbers directly on your motor cowling used to pull the paint off.  Some series such as Bassmania issues them to the anglers at the start of the day when they are getting their boat inspected
hey greenfshrmn, have you ever been in a bassmania tourny, when they held it out of baileys bay on chemong lake?
yes I know the ones Andy uses in his series as I fish it; I was looking to get some for own Barrie club..thanks
